name: Inter-dimensional space cleaner Maro Kondi
description:
Tired of your old toys, your hamster's wife or your wife? Maro Kondi is here to help! Help your clients fall in love again with their homes, by getting rid of anything that does not scintillates joy.

Featuring:

  • 2 lo-fi chill beats to rearrange your life to.
  • An entire roundabout of puns on spheres and squares.
  • Environmental storytelling at its finest!! Learn that your client is a flat earther by looking at a globe.
  • A character sprite that is so good that we had no time left to draw the other one so it's just a bunch of squares thrown together in paint (yeah)
  • A *~secret ending!!!1!!!!~* (careful, it's a bit spooky)

NOTE: the web build can take some time to load, with the loading bar staying empty for a long time, but it does load eventually. For the best experience, download the windows build.

Contributors:

Code, design, art, writing, sfx: Tactoe

Music, 3D model: TOSHII (itch.io|soundcloud)

Maro sprite lineart: SoleN (instagram)
